title: Scan citations and write a bibliography file for a whole R project — bbt_write_quarto_bib
text: bbt_write_quarto_bib() write bibliography file scanning citation keys R project. Different bbt_write_bib(), function scans files project directory subdirectories citation keys, ensuring citations included bibliography file.

title: Scan citations and write a bibliography file for a whole R project — bbt_write_quarto_bib
code: bbt_write_quarto_bib(   bib_file = here::here("references.json"),   dir = c("", "qmd", "tex"),   pattern = "\\.qmd$|\\.tex$",   ignore = NULL,   translator = rbbt::bbt_guess_translator(bib_file),   library_id = getOption("rbbt.default.library_id", 1),   overwrite = TRUE,   filter = identity,   wd = here::here() )

title: Scan citations and write a bibliography file for a whole R project — bbt_write_quarto_bib
text: bib_file (Optional) character string path bibliography file (Default: ::("references.json")). dir (Optional) character vector indicating directories scan citation keys (Default: c("", "qmd", "tex")). pattern (Optional) character string regular expression match files scan citation keys (Default: "\.qmd$|\.tex$"). ignore (Optional) character string regular expression match files ignore scanning citation keys (Default: NULL). translator (Optional) character string name translator use writing bibliography file. available translators : json (CSL-JSON), biblatex, bibtex (BibLaTeX), yaml (CSL YAML). CSL-JSON recommended users specifically using LaTeX citation processor. See bbt_write_bib() details (Default: rbbt::bbt_guess_translator(bib_file)). library_id (Optional) numeric integer Zotero library ID use writing bibliography file. See bbt_write_bib() details (Default: getOption("rbbt.default.library_id", 1)). overwrite (Optional) logical flag indicating whether overwrite bibliography file already exists (Default: TRUE). filter (Optional) function filter bibliography entries writing bibliography file. See bbt_write_bib() details (Default: identity). wd (Optional) character string path working directory (Default: ::()).
